titles.title: Alien Removal Not Resort Stays Act
Alien Removal Not Resort Stays Act
To terminate the Shelter and Services Program of the Federal Emergency Management Agency, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committee on Appropriations, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committee on Appropriations, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
